channel.title: pepper on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in pepper on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Digestive Disorders
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Colds, Coughs, Foot problems, Head aches, and Skin care among other topics.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Coughs
item.description: This is the third post in the series which started with Hair Care. The second of which was on Colds. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Colds
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.
